name: Random Region
content:
When you need to create a new region and need inspiration, roll one up. First, roll 1d12 for the region name template. Then, roll for each component of that template until you have a complete name. Rewrite or re-roll any result you don’t like.

 

D12 Region Name Template
1-4 @RollTable[BbGGHOXJHyEUxaZw]{Random Region - Adjective} @RollTable[M9bDEbjix00XD4cW]{Random Region - Terrain}
5-6 @RollTable[M9bDEbjix00XD4cW]{Random Region - Terrain} of (the) @RollTable[dI32g9RZGLjd4md4]{Random Region - Noun}
7-8 The @RollTable[M9bDEbjix00XD4cW]{Random Region - Terrain} @RollTable[BbGGHOXJHyEUxaZw]{Random Region - Adjective}
9-10 @RollTable[dI32g9RZGLjd4md4]{Random Region - Noun} @RollTable[M9bDEbjix00XD4cW]{Random Region - Terrain}
11 @RollTable[dI32g9RZGLjd4md4]{Random Region - Noun}’s @RollTable[BbGGHOXJHyEUxaZw]{Random Region - Adjective} @RollTable[M9bDEbjix00XD4cW]{Random Region - Terrain}
12 @RollTable[BbGGHOXJHyEUxaZw]{Random Region - Adjective} @RollTable[M9bDEbjix00XD4cW]{Random Region - Terrain} of (the) [Noun]
